alert.note: Alert for Western Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 5:27AM AKST until December 28 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph with visibility down to one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...Shemya. * WHEN...From 11am today to 11pm HAST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Air temperature expected to be between 31 and 35 degrees, which will make it difficult for snow to drift. Visibility reductions likely due to snow falling sideways in strong wind.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
